title: #101 - Vsauce (Michael Stevens)
description: On this episode of The H3 Podcast we are once again joined by longtime friend of the show- Michael Stevens aka Vsauce! Together we discuss corn, when it's safe to eat poop, hyper-smart chimps, beards, The Stanford Prison Experiment, robots, hyperspace, multiverse theory, and making babies (among other things). Michael's show Mind Field just finished it's 3rd season which you can catch on YouTube Premium!
itunes:author: Ethan Klein
